ccre.net

Class IgneousNetworkProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.net.IgneousNetworkProvider

  • public class IgneousNetworkProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    A network provider that works on Squawk and the FRC robot. This is because Java ME doesn't use the same interface as Java SE.

    • Method Summary

      java.lang.String getPlatformType()
      Gets a string representing the platform type for this system.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public static void register()
        Ensure that this is registered as the network provider. A warning will be logged if this is called a second time.

      • openClient

        public ClientSocket openClient(java.lang.String host,
                      int port)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Open a client socket to the specified target address and port.
        Parameters:
        host - the IP address to connect to.
        port - the port to connect to.
        Returns:
        the ClientSocket that represents the connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • openServer

        public ServerSocket openServer(int port)
                        throws java.io.IOException
        Open a server socket to listen on the specified port.
        Parameters:
        port - the port to listen on.
        Returns:
        the ServerSocket that represents the connection.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • listIPv4Addresses

        public CCollection listIPv4Addresses()
        List all IPv4 addresses of the current system. This includes 127.0.0.1.
        Returns:
        a collection of the IPv4 addresses of the current system.

      • getPlatformType

        public java.lang.String getPlatformType()
        Gets a string representing the platform type for this system. This is used by CluckNode to create a node ID.
        Returns:
        The platform type string.
